availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: State militia organization from Mercer County, Kentucky. Operated under Halls Gap Battalion. Commander(s): Colonel John D. Hale.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Military Board of Kentucky, made to the General Assembly, September 10, 1861 (Frankfort, Ky.: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1861), 7.
Congressional Edition, 66th Congress, 2d Session, Dec. 1, 1919 - June 5, 1920, vol. 7653, 27-31 posted on “Pensions for Militia and State Troops,” Eastern Kentucky and the Civil War, Marlitta H. Perkins, July 16, 2013, https://eakycivilwar.blogspot.com/2013/07/pensions-for-militia-and-state-troops.html (accessed November 4, 2020).
